Package edu.foxobyte.pokemon.calculator

Class GrowthRateCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.foxobyte.pokemon.calculator.GrowthRateCalculator
  • public class GrowthRateCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Growth rates determine how much experience a Pok√©mon will need before leveling up from its current level. Each growth rate is defined by their corresponding equation.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    foxobyte

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GrowthRateCalculator()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int calculateErraticGrowthRate​(int n)
      Cased cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = \begin{cases} \frac{n^3\left(100 - n\right)}{50} & n < 50 \\ \frac{n^3\left(150 - n\right)}{100} & 50 \le n < 68 \\ \frac{n^3\lfloor\frac{1911-10n}{3}\rfloor}{500} & 68 \le n < 98 \\ \frac{n^3\left(160 - n\right)}{100} & 98 \le n < 100 \end{cases}\)
      static int calculateFastGrowthRate​(int n)
      Cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = \frac{4n^3}{5}\)
      static int calculateFluctuatingGrowthRate​(int n)
      Cased cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = \begin{cases} \frac{n^3 \left( \lfloor\frac{n + 1}{3}\rfloor + 24\right)}{50} & n < 15 \\ \frac{n^3\left(n + 14\right)}{50} & 15 \le n < 36 \\ \frac{n^3\left(\lfloor\frac{n}{2}\rfloor + 32 \right)}{50} & 36 \le n < 100 \end{cases}\)
      static int calculateMediumFastGrowthRate​(int n)
      Cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = n^3\)
      static int calculateMediumSlowGrowthRate​(int n)
      Cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = \frac{6}{5}n^3 - 15n^2 + 100n - 140\)
      static int calculateSlowGrowthRate​(int n)
      Cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = \frac{5n^3}{4}\)

    • Method Detail

      • calculateErraticGrowthRate

        public static int calculateErraticGrowthRate​(int n)
        Cased cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

        \(EXP = \begin{cases} \frac{n^3\left(100 - n\right)}{50} & n < 50 \\ \frac{n^3\left(150 - n\right)}{100} & 50 \le n < 68 \\ \frac{n^3\lfloor\frac{1911-10n}{3}\rfloor}{500} & 68 \le n < 98 \\ \frac{n^3\left(160 - n\right)}{100} & 98 \le n < 100 \end{cases}\)
        Parameters:
        n - int value of the level
        Returns:
        int value of the experience required to reach the level n

      • calculateFastGrowthRate

        public static int calculateFastGrowthRate​(int n)
        Cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

        \(EXP = \frac{4n^3}{5}\)
        Parameters:
        n - int value of the level
        Returns:
        return the total exp value required to reach level of n

      • calculateMediumFastGrowthRate

        public static int calculateMediumFastGrowthRate​(int n)
        Cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

        \(EXP = n^3\)
        Parameters:
        n - int value of the level
        Returns:
        int value of the experience required to reach the level n

      • calculateMediumSlowGrowthRate

        public static int calculateMediumSlowGrowthRate​(int n)
        Cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

        \(EXP = \frac{6}{5}n^3 - 15n^2 + 100n - 140\)
        Parameters:
        n - int value of the level
        Returns:
        int value of the experience required to reach the level n

      • calculateFluctuatingGrowthRate

        public static int calculateFluctuatingGrowthRate​(int n)
        Cased cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

        \(EXP = \begin{cases} \frac{n^3 \left( \lfloor\frac{n + 1}{3}\rfloor + 24\right)}{50} & n < 15 \\ \frac{n^3\left(n + 14\right)}{50} & 15 \le n < 36 \\ \frac{n^3\left(\lfloor\frac{n}{2}\rfloor + 32 \right)}{50} & 36 \le n < 100 \end{cases}\)
        Parameters:
        n - int value of the level
        Returns:
        int value of the experience required to reach the level n
